title: Happy Birthday, Hanayo-chan!
detail_text: <:th_ch0105/>Hanayo-sama, I have come to pick you up!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>Y-, You-san!? What’s with the outfit!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>Ehehe, how do I look? I’ll be your escort to the birthday party today. So I tried to dress the part!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>It.... really suits you! You look so cool, You-san!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>I’m doing this just for you, okay, Hanayo-chan♪ Come, take my hand!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>I kind of feel like a princess right now. I’m so nervous that my legs are trembling....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>In that case.... Up we go!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>Kyaaah!? P-, put me down! I’m too heavy~~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>Let’s go to the party like this! Happy birthday, Hanayo-chan!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>A-, Ah, thank you so muuuch~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
